markdownRemark.html:
Stakeholders schema

Schema: Meta -> Stakeholders
Version: 1

The Stakeholders holds a list of Stakeholder and defines the ratio of profit sharing to each of the stakeholders.

Schema

Property Occurs Expected Type Description
context 1 URL The location of this schema:
https://iscn.like.co/schema/stakeholders-v1
stakeholders 1 [Stakeholder] An array of Stakeholder, the sum of sharing MUST be 1.
